Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293 cells expressing the DJ-1 (PARK7) c.107C>T (p.S36L) variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression of the variant showed a 40% reduction compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: The luciferase reporter assay was performed in HEK293 cells expressing the DJ-1 (PARK7) c.107C>T (p.S36L) variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Luciferase activity was reduced by 30% in cells expressing the variant compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Luciferase activity greater than 85% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Luciferase activity less than 60% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: The cell survival assay was conducted in HEK293 cells expressing the DJ-1 (PARK7) c.107C>T (p.S36L) variant.

Readout description.Result Description: Cell survival was reduced by 20% in cells expressing the variant compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell survival greater than 85% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell survival less than 60% compared to wild-type.
